info.title: AFAS Dossiers, bijlagen en workflows API
info.description: This API describes the endpoints related to Dossiers, bijlagen en workflows. Use this API with the functional description of the API.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Pagination: amount of results skipped. Starts at 0

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Pagination: amount of results returned

parameters.name: orderbyfieldids
parameters.description: Must be used to prevent reordered results

parameters.name: filterfieldids
parameters.description: The fieldIds of the values to filter on

parameters.name: filtervalues
parameters.description: The values to filter on

parameters.name: operatortypes
parameters.description:
Operator for comparing filter values. Supported values include:

* `1` - =  (is equal to)
* `2` - >= (is greater or equal to)
* `3` - <= (is less or equal to)
* `4` - >  (is greater than)
* `5` - <  (is less than)
* `6` - *  (contains text)
* `7` - != (is not equal to)
* `8` - [] (is empty)
* `9` - ![] (is not empty)
* `10` - @   (starts with)
* `11` - !* (does not contain text)
* `12` - !@ (does not start with)
* `13` - &  (ends with)
* `14` - !& (does not end with)
* `15` - Sf (quickfilter)

get.summary: Get files based on the file Id and escaped file name

parameters.name: fileid
parameters.description: fileid value can be retrieved in Get endpoint Profit_Subject_Attachments

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: File Name can be retrieved in Get endpoint Profit_Subject_Attachments and must be escaped

Fields.SbTx: Add a workflow id to the id field to trigger a specific workflow. Also the properties can be used for this( FvF1 - FvF3)

Fields.Ds: Subject connected to a person created by user ALLARDJ
Subject attached to organisation and contact.
Fields.SbTx: Example of a longer description that is optional for a subject.

Fields.Ds: Toevoegen van een bijlage voor een organisatie
Subject attached to a project with custom fields with projectdata

Fields.SbTx: It appears that a cosmic event has impacted our communciation services, making the magnumserver inaccessible. Calling all space technicians for a swift resolution!

X-AFAS-Proxy-Stats.description: init(0ms), before response(10ms), after response(609ms), after compressing(610ms), complete(610ms)

Fields.SbTx: Galactic explorers marveled as they witnessed a shimmering supernova painting the distant cosmos with vibrant hues, forever etching the memory into their hearts.

X-AFAS-Proxy-Stats.description: init(0ms), before response(10ms), after response(609ms), after compressing(610ms), complete(610ms)

post.description:
Update main record in KnSubject and insert subrecord into KnSubjectAttachment. 
 https://help.afas.nl/help/NL/SE/App_Conect_UpdDsc_170.htm

X-AFAS-Proxy-Stats.description: init(0ms), before response(10ms), after response(609ms), after compressing(610ms), complete(610ms)

parameters.name: SbId
parameters.description: Dossier item

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Response ID

Fields.Tx: Put the task to the next step in the workflow.
Dit is de reactie van het dossieritem die door de workflow heen wordt gezet.

get.summary: Retrieve the meta info of the Profit environment and the available connectors
Retieve the metainfo of a specific connector based on the endpoint id. This includes the fields and their properties.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Add the type of connector you want to get the meta info from

parameters.name: Endpoint
parameters.description: Add the endpoint id of the connector you want to get the meta info from

get.summary: Retieve the metainfo of a custom getconnector based on the endpoint id. This includes the fields and their properties. These id's can be found in the metainfo request result.

parameters.name: Endpoint
parameters.description: Add the id of connector you want to get the meta info from

get.summary: Get a subject attachment based on the subject Id and file Id

parameters.name: SubjectId
parameters.description: SbId value can be retrieved in Get endpoint Profit_Subjects

parameters.name: FileId
parameters.description: File Id can be retrieved in Get endpoint Profit_Subject_Attachments

AfasToken.name: Authorization
AfasToken.description: Convert the XML token to Base64 and add 'AfasToken ' in front of it.

Accept-Language.name: Accept-Language
Accept-Language.description: Indicates the client's preferred language for the response. If not provided, the API defaults to the base environment language.

Content-Type.name: Content-Type
Content-Type.description: Specifies the media type and character encoding for the request body. Ensures proper decoding and interpretation of the transmitted data.

401.description: Unauthorized; valid token but no access to this endpoint.

403.description: Forbidden; Due to IP restrictions in AFAS environment.

404.description: Not Found; requested resource is not available on the server.

503.description: Service unavailable; retry at a later time. Contains the number of seconds to wait before retrying the request

example.example: Service temporarily unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. Please check afasstatus.nl for details.
